headline: Robinhood Is Finally Joining the S&P 500. Should You Buy HOOD Stock Here?
summary: Robinhood stock rallies on news it will replace Caesars Entertainment in the S&P 500 later this month. But much of the index inclusion optimism may already be priced into HOOD shares.

headline: Why Caesars Entertainment (CZR) Stock Is Down Today
summary: Shares of hotel and casino entertainment company Caesars Entertainment (NASDAQ:CZR) fell 1.5% in the morning session after S&P Dow Jones Indices announced that the company will be removed from the S&P 500 index.

headline: Why Is AppLovin (APP) Stock Rocketing Higher Today
summary: Shares of mobile app technology company AppLovin (NASDAQ:APP) jumped 11.3% in the morning session after S&P Dow Jones Indices announced on Friday that the company will be added to the benchmark S&P 500 index.

headline: Robinhood, AppLovin, and Emcor Stocks Trade Higher on News of S&P 500 Inclusion
summary: Robinhood Markets, AppLovin, and Emcor Group shares gained on word they will be added to the S&P 500 prior to the start of trading Sept. 22.
